item.title: Charlie Puth - Dangerously
item.description:

hurt

first

the truth
Drunk off of that love
my head up

you

but you’re choking me
I was so obsessed
gave you all of me
And now honestly
I got nothing left
I loved you
dangerously

that I breathe

at the speed
That we were going
didn’t care
If the explosion
ruined me

dangerously

at the speed

didn’t care

ruined me

down down

now now
